Html:
Hi
I like to copy a file from our WPP server to a client. Is it possible to do it with WPP?

mistered5 wrote:
I like to copy a file from our WPP server to a client. Is it possible to do it with WPP?
Hi,

i think it is more easier to copy a file with Group Policy Preferences or with a Batch or a Command File to the Client.

Hi, you can either
  • Use a GPO as Winfried said.
    or
  • Create a custom update and use a "Copy File" element
